items.name: Bluetooth
items.hint: A message that tells the user why the app needs access to Bluetooth.

items.name: Bluetooth
items.hint: A message that tells the user why the app is requesting the ability to connect to Bluetooth peripherals.

items.name: Calendar and Reminders
items.hint: A message that tells the user why the app is requesting access to the user’s calendar data.

items.name: Calendar and Reminders
items.hint: A message that tells the user why the app is requesting access to the user’s reminders.

items.name: Camera and Microphone
items.hint: A message that tells the user why the app is requesting access to the device’s camera.

items.name: Camera and Microphone
items.hint: A message that tells the user why the app is requesting access to the device’s microphone.

items.name: Contacts
items.hint: A message that tells the user why the app is requesting access to the user’s contacts.

items.name: Face ID
items.hint: A message that tells the user why the app is requesting the ability to authenticate with Face ID.

items.name: Files and Folders
items.hint: A message that tells the user why the app needs access to the user’s Desktop folder.

items.name: Files and Folders
items.hint: A message that tells the user why the app needs access to the user’s Documents folder.

items.name: Files and Folders
items.hint: A message that tells the user why the app needs access to the user’s Downloads folder.

items.name: Files and Folders
items.hint: A message that tells the user why the app needs access to files on a network volume.

items.name: Files and Folders
items.hint: A message that tells the user why the app needs access to files on a removable volume.

items.name: Files and Folders
items.hint: A message that tells the user why the app needs to be informed when other apps access files that it manages.

items.name: Files and Folders
items.hint: A message that tells the user why the app needs access to files managed by a file provider.

items.name: Health
items.hint: A message to the user that explains why the app requested permission to read clinical records.

items.name: Health
items.hint: A message to the user that explains why the app requested permission to read samples from the HealthKit store.

items.name: Health
items.hint: A message to the user that explains why the app requested permission to save samples to the HealthKit store.

items.name: Health
items.hint: The clinical record data types that your app must get permission to read.

items.name: Home
items.hint: A message that tells the user why the app is requesting access to the user’s HomeKit configuration data.

items.name: Location
items.hint: A message that tells the user why the app is requesting access to the user’s location information at all times.

items.name: Location
items.hint: A message that tells the user why the app is requesting access to the user’s location information.

items.name: Location
items.hint: A message that tells the user why the app is requesting access to the user’s location information while the app is running in the foreground.

items.name: Location
items.hint: A message that tells the user why the app is requesting access to the user's location at all times.

items.name: Location
items.hint: A Boolean value indicating that a widget uses the user’s location information.

items.name: MediaPlayer
items.hint: A message that tells the user why the app is requesting access to the user’s media library.

items.name: Motion
items.hint: A message that tells the user why the app is requesting access to the device’s accelerometer.

items.name: Networking
items.hint: A message that tells the user why the app is requesting access to the local network.

items.name: NFC
items.hint: A message that tells the user why the app is requesting access to the device’s NFC hardware.

items.name: Photos
items.hint: A message that tells the user why the app is requesting write-only access to the user’s photo library.

items.name: Photos
items.hint: A message that tells the user why the app is requesting access to the user’s photo library.

items.name: Scripting
items.hint: A Boolean value indicating whether AppleScript is enabled.

items.name: Security
items.hint: A message that informs the user why an app is requesting permission to use data for tracking the user or the device.

items.name: Security
items.hint: A message that tells the user why the app is requesting the ability to send Apple events.

items.name: Security
items.hint: A message in macOS that tells the user why the app is requesting to manipulate the system configuration.

items.name: Security
items.hint: A Boolean value indicating whether the app uses encryption.

items.name: Security
items.hint: The export compliance code provided by App Store Connect for apps that require it.

items.name: Siri
items.hint: A message that tells the user why the app is requesting to send user data to Siri.

items.name: Speech
items.hint: A message that tells the user why the app is requesting to send user data to Apple’s speech recognition servers.

items.name: TV
items.hint: A message that tells the user why the app is requesting access to the user’s TV provider account.

items.name: Wi-Fi
items.hint: A Boolean value indicating whether the app requires a Wi-Fi connection.
